org.glyptodon.guacamole.net.auth.simple

Class SimpleUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glyptodon.guacamole.net.auth.AbstractUser
      • org.glyptodon.guacamole.net.auth.simple.SimpleUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User

    public class SimpleUser
extends AbstractUser
    An extremely basic User implementation.
    Author:
    Michael Jumper

      • SimpleUser

        public SimpleUser()
        Creates a completely uninitialized SimpleUser.

      • SimpleUser

        public SimpleUser(String username,
          Map<String,GuacamoleConfiguration> configs,
          Collection<ConnectionGroup> groups)
        Creates a new SimpleUser having the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to assign to this SimpleUser.
        configs - All configurations this user has read access to.
        groups - All groups this user has read access to.

    • Method Detail

      • getPermissions

        public Set<Permission> getPermissions()
                               throws GuacamoleException
        Description copied from interface: User
        Lists all permissions given to this user.
        Returns:
        A Set of all permissions granted to this user.
        Throws:
        GuacamoleException - If an error occurs while retrieving permissions, or if reading all permissions is not allowed.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(Permission permission)
                      throws GuacamoleException
        Description copied from interface: User
        Tests whether this user has the specified permission.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to check.
        Returns:
        true if the permission is granted to this user, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        GuacamoleException - If an error occurs while checking permissions, or if permissions cannot be checked due to lack of permissions to do so.

      • addPermission

        public void addPermission(Permission permission)
                   throws GuacamoleException
        Description copied from interface: User
        Adds the specified permission to this user.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to add.
        Throws:
        GuacamoleException - If an error occurs while adding the permission. or if permission to add permissions is denied.

      • removePermission

        public void removePermission(Permission permission)
                      throws GuacamoleException
        Description copied from interface: User
        Removes the specified permission from this specified user.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to remove.
        Throws:
        GuacamoleException - If an error occurs while removing the permission. or if permission to remove permissions is denied.
